title: ActorRecord
description: Canonical schema for actor records as defined in 02_actor.md

id.description: Unique, human-readable identifier for the actor.

displayName.description: The name of the actor to be used in user interfaces.

publicKey.description: The Ed25519 public key (base64 encoded, 44 characters) for verifying the actor's signatures.

roles.description: List of capacity roles defining the actor's skills and permissions. Uses hierarchical format with colons.

status.description: Optional. The lifecycle status of the actor. Defaults to 'active' if not specified.

supersededBy.description: Optional. The ID of the actor that replaces this one.

metadata.description: An optional field for additional, non-canonical metadata.
